dt: {bc}the rank or essential nature of a god {bc}{sx|divinity||}
{bc}one exalted or revered as supremely good or powerful

dt.t: such established American {it}deities{/it} as Daniel Boone, Kit Carson

et: Middle English {it}deitee{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}deité{/it}, from Late Latin {it}deitat-, deitas{/it}, from Latin {it}deus{/it} god; akin to Old English {it}Tīw{/it}, god of war, Latin {it}divus{/it} god, {it}dies{/it} day, Greek {it}dios{/it} heavenly, Sanskrit {it}deva{/it} heavenly, god
shortdef: the rank or essential nature of a god : divinity
